title: SPRING'S PROMISE
description: It wasn't Mary Ann's idea to travel halfway across the world, leaving everything behind. Henry, on the other hand, always craved adventure and the call of the open seas. With the familiar comforts of England far behind, Mary Ann discovered she was pregnant on the voyage to Canada. Giving birth in a foreign county in the 1800s Canada wasn't on Mary Ann's to-do list either. Now a young mother, Mary Ann is bound and determined to head back home but Henry believes Canada has more to offer... Will Mary Ann give it a chance?This novel is based on a true story and takes place in 1884.
author: Angeline Gallant
